FileFormat.FormatDescription: QuadriSpace provide 3D Publishing and Documentation software. This entry currently covers each known QuadriSpace-specifc format, however it may be possible and necessary to separate different QuadriSpace formats into their own entries in the future.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: Å¸.|N With further research it may be possible to distinguish between different types of QuadriSpace formats. For now, known formats that conform to this signature pattern are: .qsd - QuadriSpace Document Format .qst - QuadriSpace Template .qsm - QuadriSpace Model .qsl - QuadriSpace Material
